google_play_reviews.content: Phenomenal collection!!! This is easily the greatest Muzei integration. Stunning photos from across the globe. People, animals, places and things. Masterfully curated. Never the same photo...!
Damnnn now this is one hella amazing muzei extension! (灬º‿º灬)♡
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Please try the new update 2.0. Lots of improvements on image quality. :)

google_play_reviews.content: Really like the Muzei app. I want to ask, do the wallpapers on national geographic add on, get stored on local phone storage?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: They are cached by Muzei, yes. If you want to see them, check out the app "Muzei Saver".

google_play_reviews.content: I really like this app and I look forward to seeing the new photos everyday. But recently there's a problem and muzei is not updating. Can you look into it and fix please? Thanks! Edit 18/04/21: Hi, the app has been updating fine almost every day now. But the redirect links to Nat Geo's photo of the day page is not working, and I think the About this photo is also not showing the correct description.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. Regarding the Nat Geo link. Yes, they changed their website. As this is now even more unreliable, I removed the feature. The "about" should be fine, though. Please check again. In doubt, change the "random photo" setting back and forth again, to clear the cache and try again. Cheers!

google_play_reviews.content: Worked fine until I switched phones. Glitches on my Samsung S20+ now. Flickers as if it is trying to load all images at once.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The last couple of weeks, the app didn't work properly, true. Please try if the new updated fixes your problems. :)

google_play_reviews.content: Love Muzei for the ease of having a different wallpaper without having to find and manually change it and am a huge fan of landscape photos so this plugin is amazing
Probably the best muzei source!! Great.

Probably a good add-on in general, however not for me as when I installed it the first picture was of a high definition close up of a yellow spider! Great photo but phones are anxiety inducing enough without arachnids. Resisting the urge to throw my phone up in the air (and probably smash the AMOLED display), I NOPED out of there very quickly. :O
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I can relate to that. :) But maybe give it another try: Spiders show up very rarely. :)

google_play_reviews.content: Understood your poin and i installed the Muzei app but still Not opening inmy Mi A1 mobile.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The app doesn't open? This is just a plugin. You need the app "Muzei" to actually use it.

google_play_reviews.content: Great source. Would be perfect if it would be possible to choose the position of the wallpaper that will be on the main screen. Or some kind of portrait mode.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! That would be something the Muzei App would have to implement. :)

google_play_reviews.content: My #1 muzei source! Mindblowingly gorgeous shots that work remarkably well as backgrounds ❤
